Package bio.singa.mathematics.vectors

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.vectors.RegularVector
      • bio.singa.mathematics.vectors.Vector2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Addable<Vector>, AdditivelyInvertible<Vector>, Divisible<Vector>, Invertible<Vector>, MultiDimensional<Vector>, Multipliable<Vector>, Ring<Vector>, Subtractable<Vector>, Metrizable<Vector>, Transformable<Vector>, Vector
    public class Vector2D
extends RegularVector
    The Vector2D class handles the general properties and operations of two dimensional vectors. Basically this is an regular vector with the constraint, that it can only contain two values. This fascade can be used to handle two dimensional vectors without dimensional violations. Additionally it is able to perform operations that are solely defined for 2D vectors.
